author: cms-svj
body:
#### PR description:

While producing private signal samples for analysis with the Run 2 HLT scouting data, we noticed that the scouting collections were not present in the output files when following the UL16 MC recipe (unlike UL17 and UL18, which do have scouting collections). There were two contributing factors:
1. The producers for the scouting collections were not in the MC HLT menu.
2. The event content definitions did not include the scouting collection names.

This PR solves both issues. (Thanks to @dsperka for providing an updated HLT menu with the producers included, from which I extracted only the relevant and necessary configurations and added them to the existing menu.)

No content is changed; just new scouting collections are added. Therefore, this should be a viable update for future UL16 MC requests.

#### PR validation:

Reran private signal production and observed the desired collections with the expected content (jets, etc.).

attn: @tresreid @cericeci
title: HLT scouting event content and producers [80X]
